exceptions.tactic: intros P Q H a b H0 H1.
apply H in H0 as H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a Q -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a P" on hypothesis of type "reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a b".

original: intros P Q H a b H0 H1. apply H in H0 as H2. apply H2 in H1.
